title: The Football Player's Obsession
description: I’ve been in love with Penny Fox from the moment our eyes first met across the hall in high school. But she’s always been out of reach. That’s okay because I’ve waited for her. I’ve followed her.Stalked her.Now that we’re at college, I’m going to claim her as my own.But then she shows up at a frat party trying to reinvent herself, and I’m about to lose my mind.She’s mine—whether she knows it yet or not.
author: Emma Bray
